title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the redraw operation is inefficient, resulting in multiple redraws per visible line.
EB: This issue should only result in one redraw per visible line at a maximum.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in StyledText.
2. Change the text in StyledText.
3. Observe the redraw behavior and notice multiple redraws per visible line.
